General.Name: Ifishdeco PT
General.Description: PT Ifishdeco Tbk engages in the mining exploration, development, production, transportation, trading, and sales of nickel ores. It processes, transports, trades in, and sells nickel pig iron and ferronickel alloy. The company was founded in 1971 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
General.Address: Wisma Nugra Santana Building, Jakarta Pusat, Indonesia, 10220
